title: Air links of the world. No. 6. Southern Cross route
creator_credit: Australian Instructional Films, Jean Halliday and Lex Halliday
brief_description: Shows the air route between Australia and America pioneered by Kingsford-Smith in the Southern Cross. An Australian family flies from Australia to the USA. Maps and scenes of route and places visited including Fiji, Canton Island, Hawaii to San Francisco.
